LG Programme in MEIS is the IFMIS Output.
All VUP PW projects have to be classified with main type 'SP-PW'.

Ususally programmes are open during the time of their implementation period. In exceptional cases programmes might be frozen (e.g. budget inavailaiblity or other reasons). If a programme ends, it should be set to closed.

us:lang.translation: Type de document de soutien LCF

us:descriptions.us:description: Type de document de soutien LCF
Year when sector entered PW.
Year when sector entered DS.
Year when sector entered FS.
The size of the provisional target list (created automatically from the targeting criteria).
The size of the Enrolment List (Targeted + Forced-In + Forced-Out).
The household in the enrolment list which are directly form the provisional targeting list.
The sum of households which are coming from the provisional target list + the forced ins.
Please enter a short title of the project.

Describe briefly the planned project including the actual problem, a project description and its different elements. LED projects: please describe how the local potentiality is considered in the project design.
Please define the expected lifespan of the project (in years).
Please provide the year of construction.
Please provide the last year the project has been rehabilitated.
Please indicate the financial year in which the project shall start.
Please indicate the financial year it shall be finalised (final acceptance of the infrastructure)

Please select the appropriate project status. A project that did not start yet, please select the status "Project planning". A project where the tendering of the works contract started already, select "Works tender ongoing". If the project is a continuation of previous phases, please select "Continuation of other phase".
If the project is a continuation of previous phases, please please enter the date when the first phase started.
Please select "yes" if the project is a VUP PW or HIMO project, further specify which type it is. Then also specify the number of working days for beneficiaries in section 2.
Please briefly explain the type of utilities required and their availability. E.g. is the site accessible by a road all year long? (Checklist)
Please specify if the private sector is contributing or implied in the design, construction or later operation of the infrastructure by selecting "yes" or "no".
Please specify in which of the above fields the private sector will contribute.
Please list other stakeholders and there key role in this project. E.g. NGOs or civil societies.
Please describe what happens if the infrastructure is used.

rev:attribute.name: false

us:descriptions.us:description: What will have been realized at the end of the project (e.g. km of roads rehabilitated, ha of terraces built)?

rev:attribute.ut:remark: needs to be implemented, between outcome and activities.

us:descriptions.us:description: @Rebecca
In case this is a HIMO project, please provide the total number of working days to be provided by beneficiaries.
Is there any impact on employment? "Yes" or "No".
How many people will be employed during the LG infrastructure construction?
Please specify / estimate how many skilled people will be employed during the LG infrastructure construction.

Please state number of permanent jobs likely to be created (for at least 6 months) directly & indirectly by the project for non-skilled labour. (Exclude: jobs created by the works or supervision itself)
Please specify / estimate how many skilled people will be employed during the LG infrastructure construction.
Please specify / estimate how many non-skilled people will be employed during the LG infrastructure construction.
Please define the direct beneficiaries or direct users of the project. E.g. For roads: population living in 2 km radius of the road
Please provide the estimated number of direct beneficiaries.

Please indicate the total investment costs of this project. For an infrastructure these are all estimated costs until the final approval of construction including the cost of labour employed under the HIMO approach. Exclude: annual operation or maintenance costs
Please specify, if the project is co-funded by another entity.
For co-funded projects indicate the percentage of these contributions in terms of overall investment.
If the project is co-funded, please enter the co-funding organizations such as national agencies, development partners or others.

us:lang.translation: Cost estimate of yearly maintenance costs

us:descriptions.us:description: Please indicate the annual maintenance cost estimate once the infrastructure is available and is maintained by the District.

us:lang.translation: Cost estimate of yearly costs for operation

us:descriptions.us:description: Please indicate the annual operation cost estimate once the infrastructure is available.
In which category the main costs will arise? Investment (INV), Study (ST), Capacity Building (CB) Operational Costs (OC)? Otherwise select "Other".
Please estimate the total project investment costs (without operation and maintenance) by Financial Year.
Please select if the planned project is defined in the DDS or in a sector strategy / programme. If the latter applies, please add the name.
Please select if the planned project is defined in the DDP or in a sector strategy / programme. If the latter applies, please add the name.

us:lang.translation: Which type of FS is available?

us:descriptions.us:description: Sselect a list item and provide the date of completion if the FS is available. A full feasibility study covers: technical study, socio-economic analysis, EIA. A simplified feasibility assessment is sufficient for social cluster projects

us:lang.translation: What is the date of completion of the feasibility study?

us:descriptions.us:description: Please select Y/N and provide the date of completion if applicable (if "yes" is selected)

us:lang.translation: Is an environmental impact assessment available?

us:descriptions.us:description: Please select Y/N and provide the date of completion if applicable (if "yes" is selected)

us:lang.translation: Is a social impact assessment available?

us:descriptions.us:description: Please select Y/N and provide the date of completion if applicable (if "yes" is selected)

us:lang.translation: If yes, Financial Year of completion
Is there expropriation required to construct the infrastructure?
Do you have an Environmental and Social Management Plan?
Please upload available studies in the "Files" section.

Please select the corresponding annual priority area defined by MINECOFIN for the next FY
Describe the (strategic) objective defined by the responsible Line Ministry the project will contribute to. Please provide the respective objective as well as the source (document name).
Select Y/N, and specify the respective priority by overwriting the respective field
Select Y/N, and specify the respective priority by overwriting the respective field
